title: A farewell to popery, in a letter to Dr. Nicholas, vice-chancellor of Oxford, and warden of New-College, from W. H., M. D., lately Fellow of the same college shewing, the true motives that with-drew him to the romish religion, and the reasons of his return to the Church of England : concluding with some short reflections concerning the great duty of charity.
author: Harris, Walter, 1647-1732.
notes: Attributed to Walter Harris. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
